title: IPL final: F&B companies rejoice as demand at bars and cafes soars up to 50% amid lean summer
description: During an otherwise lean season for pubs, bars and restaurants because of people being away on summer vacations, the IPL final in Chennai triggered a dramatic spike in footfall and sales across the cricket-crazy nation, executives said.
